title: Everyone was polite…
text: Everyone that I spoke with was polite and respectful. Brent did the evaluation.  Chase called to follow-up as we were considering a trade-in with a dealer. Ryan completed the transaction a few days later. They explained the process and answered our questions. They even provided information about returning the old license plate.

title: Cheryl was a very helpful
text: Cheryl was a very helpful, she explained the process thoroughly. She was very patient and clear in explaining the steps to the 90-year-old who was actually selling the family car. All family members present agreed that going through we buy any car was great, especially for 25-year-old vehicle. I hope that others who work for the company are as helpful as was Cheryl.

title: My experience
text: I liked that setting up an appointment on line was very easy and fast.  Craig called me before the appointment to go thru the process, what to expect and the amount of time the process takes.  He also explained what he was looking for when doing the inspection.  Craig made the experience I was putting off, into very positive from start to finish. Craig also called me a few days after the sale to say thanks for choosing We Buy Any Car.  I would highly recommend WBAC to anyone wanting to sell a vehicle.

title: Gabriel was honest and very easy to do…
text: Gabriel was honest and very easy to do business with.  She was clear about the process and very transparent throughout the assessment.  I would always recommend coming here if you don't want to deal with the hassle of private sale.

title: I was skeptical about the process…
text: I was skeptical about the process involved. Josh made me comfortable right away. He was very professional and knowledgeable about buying my vehicle. I am grateful for his sincere desire to help me and make the process easier! I would encourage anyone looking to sell their vehicle to use WBAC. If you are fortunate,you will have Josh assisting you!

title: 5 Star, White Glove Experience!
text: As soon as we parked, we were met at the door by Terri.  She was welcoming, friendly, and sympathetic.  My niece is in FL attending school and had worked all summer long the previous summer to purchase a car.  Unfortunately, she purchased it from an unethical, dishonest dealership in OH and within 3 months, the engine was no longer working.  We reviewed a few different businesses that purchase vehicles and chose this one because of the stellar reviews.  Terri showed us the additional issues the car had that we were unaware of and put our minds at ease knowing we made the right decision to sell vs repair.  She made the process easy and turned a not so great day into a better one.  She got my niece the maximum amount she could for her vehicle.  I hope you never have to deal with purchasing a lemon, but if you do and the repairs exceed the value of the car, I FULLY recommend this company!  Terri is a cherry on top!

title: Excellent service
text: Gabriel and his colleague showed up exactly when expected. They were courteous and expedient. Everything was completely taken care of in the time it took me to have a couple of cups of coffee. I would definitely use the service again if I needed to do so.

title: Great first experience at webuyanycar!
text: I believe Lou was the representative that helped my wife and I, along with his trainee. They were both very genuinely friendly and helpful. Lou explained the process and made everything clear. Overall we would highly recommend this location to friends and family.

title: Friendly and professional
text: Ryan and Chase were super friendly and very professional.  They did a great job. I think the most important thing for a seller to remember is to be realistic when bringing a vehicle in to be evaluated. Decide before you go what you are willing to accept.

title: Great experience at Coral Springs, Florida!
text: The experience with Danny Munoz was very good. He was clear, straightforward, and made the process very easy and seamless. Highly recommend dealing with Danny, I believe his assessment of the car was very accurate.

title: Great service
text: John came to my home on a Saturday which made it very convenient. He explained the process and was very thorough and made selling my vehicle a pleasant experience. The price offered was fair and a check was cut right on the spot.

title: Like a cool breeze
text: Everything went very smoothly.  Even the hiccups on my end were easily dealt with.  I thought the offer was fair and was able to discuss some of the concerns in a reasonable manner and I think we reached a number both parties with. D was very personable, patient,  professional and even answered some questions in his off duty hours. It wasn’t the first appraisal I’d gotten on my car but it was the last one. Pleasure doing business then. Not to mention they paid off my lender, wrote me a check for the difference same day bought me an Uber and down the road I went.

title: We sold another car several years ago…
text: We sold another car several years ago at the same location and they had the best price. Jon is great to work with. Got dinged in the quoted price for some very minor paint chips on the hood but he accepted a counter offer from us to get us close to the original offer.

title: Laila at the Westfield branch made the…simple and easy
text: Laila at the Westfield branch made the process very easy and helpful. She did a very thorough and professional job checking out my car. She led us through all the paperwork and documentation in a quick and easy way. Also Mark helped us when we needed to bring in some additional paperwork. It was an easy and simple process to sell our car.

title: Melanie whom came to my home to do the…
text: Melanie whom came to my home to do the inspection of my car and all the paperwork was amazing, personable and genuine. My only gripe is not with her but with your financial department who offered me less than half of what the online website suggested I would get compensated for. Online it was suggested that we buy any cars would offer me $4,585. After Melanie's inspection she populated the information in her computer system and I was offered $2,100. She rebutted with someone electronically in your finance department who said $2,500 was the final offer and was not willing to negotiate further. This is not very transparent, I could see maybe the price dropping $1,000 but not over half.  My car was in good condition, one simple dent on the back, needed a typical cleaning inside and out, by no means was the car a disgraceful mess, it had a brand new battery in it and was well taken care of with zero work ever required due to an accident or other mode of damage.  No justification to offer $2485 less than suggested online.

title: Bernardo was personable and easy to…
text: Bernardo was personable and easy to work with. He inspected the vehicle and made an offer at about the amount I was expecting g.

title: May get slightly lower money but gain fast, reliable service with free ride home
text: Good, speedy service. I wish that my agent had talked me through more of the inspection part and had a slightly higher offer, closer to phone quote. But overall a good experience and I appreciated price negotiation. The free Uber was hugely helpful!

title: No lies, no hidden bullsh*t! Highly recommend.
text: I sold my car to WeBuyAnyCar in Allentown. It was a great experience, and the whole reason behind our great experience is because of Carter. From the very first second he was very polite and inviting. Inspected the car, took it for a test drive and got right to business. Carter tackled everything with extreme professionalism and handled everything with the selling process in a timely manner. He explained everything he was doing and did not keep you in the dark about anything.  He helped me get a fantastic amount on my car too. Pretty dam close to what I would get private party honestly speaking. A real no bullsh*t company.But again Carter is the man to go to if you’re working with this branch. Great experience.

text: Pre-appointment emails prepared us for documentation to bring, so there were no surprises or delays in selling our vehicle.  We received a fair price.

title: Manager Tom was professional
text: Manager Tom was honest, personable and professional. Took a bunch of pictures of my vehicle and in communication with his team, given the age of my vehicle, was presented with a low but fair offer. I highly recommend this company if you need to sell your car,

I would recommend this company to anyone I know.

title: We Buy Any Car - Indian Trail, NC
text: Working with Jerry Birenbaum at the We Buy Any Car office in Indian Trail, NC was a very positive experience.  Jerry certainly made the process easy for us to sell our car.  He was engaging, personable, friendly, professional, and very thorough in his explanation on how the We Buy Any Car process works and what he would be doing to evaluate our vehicle. We found Jerry to be extremely knowledgeable regarding cars and the automobile industry.  It was clear he had great deal of expertise and experience in the field.  That certainly gave us a high level of confidence that this would be a worthwhile transaction and that choosing We Buy Any Car would be more beneficial to us than trading our car in at a car dealership.  When we agreed on a price, Jerry moved us through the paperwork process easily and quickly.  Overall, our meeting and interaction with Jerry was a very positive experience and I would definitely recommend We Buy Any Car and Jerry, in particular, to anybody I know that was looking to sell their car.

title: I sold a car to WeBuyAnyCar (Brookline…update. I just want to say that Webuyanycar reached out. Jim, the Manager did a good job when dealing with my family. I would add a star to this review.
text: I sold a car to WeBuyAnyCar (Brookline Office) on Saturday, 10/19/2024.  I want to say that Jim was very pleasant to deal with.   That being said, your website should state that there is a $399.00 fee for transactions, title, forms, etc. that will be deducted from the price of the car. Also the appraisal of the car was 9444.00. The appraisal also showed one accident which we were unaware of.  We were told by Jim that he could not tell what kind of accident it was.  We do not know if it was a severe accident or a minor fender bender. When we went for our appointment and Jim test drove and inspected the car he came back with an offer of 4006.10.  I understand that when you fill out the info on the website you should expect some devaluation on the initial appraisal.  But seriously, almost half!  Unfortunately we are trying to liquidate an estate and needed to dispose of the car sooner rather than later.  I certainly would never go to any WeBuyAnyCar branch again.

title: Scammed
text: The response here was a passive-aggressive reply - 50k worth more than you essentially.The area manager called , left a vm , I called back and no response so left a vm, same again. He should be all over this and asking when I am available for feedback to have a direct chat. Felt scammed and lowballed from the start. “The algorithm says your car is worth $100”“There is structural damage” No proof offered and the car was meticulously maintained and serviced. There is none.Online quote was $1600 which was less than half of dealer/KBB quoted anyway.“What do you want and I’ll see what I can do but the 1600 comes down to 1300 with doc fees and there is … body… structure …. That deducts even more ““You have to pay for the document fees” What?Never again
